title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 544.6 - Original cost defined
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 544.6 - Original cost defined

State Regulations

The term original cost when used herein means the cost of
such property to the person or corporation first devoting it to public
service. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
544.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
